bike.description: Specialized FSR technology, A1 TransForm Monocoque frame with M5-XX ORE technology down tube, butted rear triangle, forged and relieved head tube and BB shell, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots, ITch Switch 100/130mm on the fly adjustable travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox Float RL, air spring and rebound adj., compression lock-out, travel adjust ITch Switch, 7.625" x 2.0"
Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Disc brake specific routing, rear derailleur hanger, owner's manual, chainstay/seatstay protector
